snippet.title: Paintball Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Paintball is a puzzle game with over 30 unique levels for people of all ages. The game can also be used for educational purposes in classroom combining geometry, arts, problem solving, planning, communication and collaboration (there is an up to three player local multiplayer).

This is a gameplay trailer showing the first two triangle puzzles + the second polyhedron puzzle and a short peak into the free play mode.

The game will be released on Steam, iOS and Android in early 2024.
